verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2351>uproar<s%> was <S%G3973>ceased,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> to him the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G782>embraced<s%> them, and <S%G1831>departed<s%> for to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And when he had <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1330>over<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> and had given them <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3870>exhortation,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1671>Greece,<s%>

And there <S%G4160>stayed<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%> And when the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1096>laid<s%> <S%G1096>wait<s%> <S%G1917><s%> for him, as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> he <S%G1096>purposed<s%> <S%G1106><s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And there <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> him <S%G891>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G960>Berea;<s%> and of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians,<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> and <S%G4580>Secundus;<s%> and <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1191>Derbe,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus;<s%> and of <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> and <S%G5161>Trophimus.<s%>
<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G4281>going<s%> <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G3306>tarried<s%> for us <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

And we <S%G1602>sailed<s%> <S%G1602>away<s%> from <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to them to <S%G5174>Troas<s%> in <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days;<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And on the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4863>came<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>preached<s%> to them, <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> on the <S%G1887>morrow;<s%> and <S%G3905>continued<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight.<s%>
And there were <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lights<s%> in the <S%G5253>upper<s%> <S%G5253>chamber,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together.<s%>

And there <S%G2521>sat<s%> in a <S%G2376>window<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus,<s%> being <S%G2702>fallen<s%> into a <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep:<s%> and as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G1909>long<s%> <S%G4119><s%> <S%G1256>preaching,<s%> he <S%G2702>sunk<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> with <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> down from the <S%G5152>third<s%> <S%G5152>loft,<s%> and was <S%G142>taken<s%> up <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> and <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1968>on<s%> him, and <S%G4843>embracing<s%> him <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2350>Trouble<s%> not yourselves; for his <S%G5590>life<s%> is in him.

When he <S%G3767>therefore<s%> was <S%G305>come<s%> up again, and had <S%G2806>broken<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G1089>eaten,<s%> and <S%G3656>talked<s%> a <S%G2425>long<s%> while, even <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G827>break<s%> of <S%G827>day,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> he <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
And they <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G3816>young<s%> man <S%G2198>alive,<s%> and were not a <S%G3357>little<s%> <S%G3870>comforted.<s%>

And we <S%G4281>went<s%> <S%G4281>before<s%> to <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G321>sailed<s%> to <S%G789>Assos,<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G353>take<s%> in <S%G3972>Paul:<s%> for <S%G3779>so<s%> had he <S%G1299>appointed,<s%> <S%G3195>minding<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to go <S%G3978>afoot.<s%>
And <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> with us <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G789>Assos,<s%> we <S%G353>took<s%> him in, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3412>Mitylene.<s%>

And we <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> the <S%G1966>next<s%> day <S%G481>over<s%> <S%G481>against<s%> <S%G5508>Chios;<s%> and the <S%G2087>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>arrived<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4544>Samos,<s%> and <S%G3306>tarried<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5175>Trogyllium;<s%> and the <S%G2192>next<s%> day we <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3399>Miletus.<s%>

For <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3896>sail<s%> by <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G3704>because<s%> he <S%G1096>would<s%> not <S%G5551>spend<s%> the <S%G5551>time<s%> in <S%G773>Asia:<s%> for he <S%G4692>hurried,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it were <S%G1415>possible<s%> for him, to be <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>
And from <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and <S%G3333>called<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they were <S%G3854>come<s%> to him, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You <S%G1987>know,<s%> from the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> that I <S%G1910>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G4459>after<s%> what <S%G4458>manner<s%> I have <S%G1096>been<s%> with you at <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5550>seasons,<s%>

<S%G1398>Serving<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>humility<s%> of mind, and with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears,<s%> and <S%G3986>temptations,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4819>befell<s%> me by the lying in <S%G1917>wait<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%>

And <S%G5613>how<s%> I <S%G5288>kept<s%> <S%G5288>back<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable<s%> to you, but <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G312>showed<s%> you, and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> you <S%G1219>publicly,<s%> and from <S%G3624>house<s%> to <S%G3624>house,<s%>

<S%G1263>Testifying<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> not <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the things that shall <S%G4876>befall<s%> me <S%G1722>there:<s%>

<S%G4133>Save<s%> that the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1263>witnesses<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that <S%G1199>bonds<s%> and <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> me.

But <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G3056>things<s%> <S%G3056>move<s%> <S%G4160><s%> me, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G2192>count<s%> I my <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5093>dear<s%> to <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G5613>so<s%> that I might <S%G5048>finish<s%> my <S%G1408>course<s%> with <S%G5479>joy,<s%> and the <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> to <S%G1263>testify<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> my <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> I take you to <S%G3143>record<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day,<s%> that I am <S%G2513>pure<s%> from the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men.
For I <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G5288>shunned<s%> to <S%G312>declare<s%> to you <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Take <S%G4337>heed<s%> therefore to <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4168>flock,<s%> <S%G1722>over<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> has <S%G5087>made<s%> you <S%G1985>overseers,<s%> to <S%G4165>feed<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G4046>purchased<s%> with his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that <S%G3326>after<s%> my <S%G867>departing<s%> shall <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G1519>among<s%> you, not <S%G5339>sparing<s%> the <S%G4168>flock.<s%>

<S%G2532>Also<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G846>selves<s%> shall <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G450>arise,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1294>perverse<s%> things, to <S%G645>draw<s%> <S%G645>away<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> them.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G1127>watch,<s%> and <S%G3421>remember,<s%> that by the <S%G5148>space<s%> of <S%G5148>three<s%> <S%G5148>years<s%> I <S%G3973>ceased<s%> not to <S%G3560>warn<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day<s%> with <S%G1144>tears.<s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I <S%G3908>commend<s%> you to <S%G2316>God,<s%> and to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of his <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2026>build<s%> you up, and to <S%G1325>give<s%> you an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them which are <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1937>coveted<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man's<s%> <S%G694>silver,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2441>apparel.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1097>know,<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5256>ministered<s%> to my <S%G5532>necessities,<s%> and to them that were with me.

I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5263>showed<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> things, how that <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2872>laboring<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G482>support<s%> the <S%G770>weak,<s%> and to <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is <S%G3122>more<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> than to receive. <S%G2983><s%>
And when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G5087>kneeled<s%> <S%G1119><s%> down, and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> with them <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1096>wept<s%> <S%G2805><s%> <S%G2425>sore,<s%> and <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G5137>neck,<s%> and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him,

<S%G3600>Sorrowing<s%> <S%G3122>most<s%> of <S%G3122>all<s%> for the <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2046>spoke,<s%> that they <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> his <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more.<s%> And they <S%G4311>accompanied<s%> him to the <S%G4143>ship.<s%>
